title: SL to receive medicine & medical equipment from India, Indonesia
body_lines: At least 101 types of medicines and surgical equipment donated by the Government of India will reach the island next Wednesday, Health Minister Prof. Channa Jayasumana said.
He said the medicines and surgical equipment will reach Sri Lanka via a vessel belonging to Indian Navy.
Meanwhile, Sri Lanka is also due to receive a donation of Rs. 340 million worth of essential medicines from the Indonesian Government within a week, he said.
